file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-15-01-04 - CONFIG-1 - CARGO SMOKE DETECTOR - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CARGO SMOKE DETECTOR - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the cargo smoke detectors. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) 26-15-01-000-801-A CARGO SMOKE DETECTOR - REMOVAL EMB-145 ACFT MODEL(S) CARGO SMOKE DETECTOR - INSTALLA- 26-15-01-400-801-A EMB-145 TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 26-15-01 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-15-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 2. CARGO SMOKE DETECTOR - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the removal of the cargo smoke detectors. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY 1 Rubber gloves Electrical insulation AR E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Baggage compartment H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-005-B (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the "BAGGAGE SMOKE DET" circuit breaker and attach a "DO-NOT-CLOSE" tag to it. I. Removal (JAMCO - Made) (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-006-B EFFECTIVITY: BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT WITH JAMCO SMOKE DETECTORS (1) Remove the bolts (1). (2) Remove the cover assembly case (2). NOTE: It is necessary to push the two locks (DET. C) to remove the cover assembly case (2). (3) Remove the bolts (3). (4) Remove the detector case (4). (5) Remove the electrical connector (5) from the detector case (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 26-15-01 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (6) Remove the bracket (6) from the liner (REF.). J. Removal (WALTER KIDDE AEROSPACE - Made) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-007-A EFFECTIVITY: BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT WITH WALTER KIDDE AEROSPACE SMOKE DETECTORS (1) Remove the bolts (1) and washers (2) that attach the protection bar (3) to the detector housing (REF.). (2) Remove the protection bar (3). (3) Remove the electrical connector (4) from the smoke detector (5). (4) Remove the nut (6) and washers (7) that attach the smoke detector (5) into the housing (REF.). (5) Remove the smoke detector (5) from the housing (REF.). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 26-15-01 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: JAMCO SMOKE DETECTOR Cargo Smoke Detector - Removal/Installation Figure 401 D B D A DOOR (REF.) BRACKET DET. A BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT SECTION D-D LINER (REF.) 6. BRACKET LINER (REF.) 5. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 4. DETECTOR CASE 3. BOLT (2) C 2. COVER ASSY CASE DET. C 1. BOLT (2) DET. B EM145AMM260292A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 26-15-01 Page 4 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: WALTER KIDDE AEROSPACE SMOKE DETECTOR Cargo Smoke Detector - Removal/Installation Figure 402 B A BAGGAGE DOOR (REF.) DET. A HOUSING (REF.) 5. SMOKE DETECTOR 3. PROTECTION BAR 2. WASHER (4) 1. BOLT (4) 4. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR DET. B 7. WASHER (4) 6. NUT (4) EM145AMM260124A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 26-15-01 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-15-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 3. CARGO SMOKE DETECTOR - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the cargo smoke detectors. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 26-15-00-700-801-A/500 - AMM TASK 26-15-00-700-802-A/500 - AMM TASK 26-15-00-700-803-A/500 - AMM TASK 26-15-00-700-804-A/500 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY 1 Rubber Gloves Electrical insulation AR F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Baggage compartment I. Installation (JAMCO - Made) (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-006-B EFFECTIVITY: BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT WITH JAMCO SMOKE DETECTORS (1) Install the bolts (3) through the detector case (4) on the bracket (6) only at the beginning of its threads. NOTE: Do the complete installation of the bolts (3) after the cover is installed at the cargo baggage liner. (2) Install the electrical connector (5) at the detector case (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 26-15-01 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Install the detector case (4) and bracket (6) at the liner (SECTION D-D), until the bracket (6) is fully up in the liner (REF.). Then, fully install the bolts (3). (4) Install the cover assembly case (2) and the bolts (1). NOTE: The two locks (DET. C) must mate before the installation of the bolts (1). J. Installation (WALTER KIDDE AEROSPACE - Made) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-007-A EFFECTIVITY: BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT WITH WALTER KIDDE AEROSPACE SMOKE DETECTORS (1) Position the smoke detector (5) into the housing (REF.). (2) Install the nut (6) and washers (7) that attach the smoke detector into the housing (REF.). (3) Install the electrical connector (4) to the smoke detector (5). (4) Position the protection bar (3). (5) Install the bolts (1) and washers (2) that attach the protection bar (3) to the smoke detector housing (REF.). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-005-B (1) Remove the "DO-NOT-CLOSE" tag and close the "BAGGAGE SMOKE DET" circuit breaker. (2) (For JAMCO smoke detector) Do the Baggage Smoke Detection System Operational Test (AMM TASK 26-15-00-700-801-A/500) or (AMM TASK 26-15-00-700-803-A/500), as applicable. (3) (For WALTER KIDDE smoke detector) Do the Baggage Smoke Detection System Operational Test (AMM TASK 26-15-00-700-802-A/500) or (AMM TASK 26-15-00-700-804-A/500), as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 26-15-01 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
